review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: Had a meal with some friends from Lebanon and Switzerland, everybody agreed it is one of the best Mediterranean restaurants around. Mezze is amazing. I strongly recommend the avocado hummus.

review_data.title: Great lebanese foods
review_data.content: Friendly place where the owners greets you. Great lebanese appetizers. Suitable for vegetarians. friendly environment for friends and couples.

review_data.title: Large mezze portions
review_data.content: Nice small garden right by Bhf Wiedkon with portions of mezze that makes you filled enough to not want mezze again for another while. Good without being anything very special

review_data.title: Beautiful place
